scripts.generate-entities: dotenv cross-var -- typeorm-model-generator -h %DB_HOST% -p %DB_PORT% -d $DB -u %DB_USER% -x %DB_PWD% -e postgres -o src/entities -s public --noConfig
scripts.migration:up: typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:run -d src/db/dataSource.ts && dotenv cross-var -- typeorm-model-generator -h %DB_HOST% -p %DB_PORT% -d $DB -u %DB_USER% -x %DB_PWD% -e postgres -o src/entities -s public --noConfig
scripts.migration:down: typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:revert -d src/db/dataSource.ts && dotenv cross-var -- typeorm-model-generator -h %DB_HOST% -p %DB_PORT% -d $DB -u %DB_USER% -x %DB_PWD% -e postgres -o src/entities -s public --noConfig
